system.attributeIncrease: @L[Ability:Normal Strength]{Normal Strength} if at least @L[Core:Size]{size} 2. @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} if at least @L[Core:Size]{size} 3. @L[Ability:Improved Strength]{Improved Strength} if at least @L[Core:Size]{size} 4.
system.hpIncrease: Gain another hit die for every 1 additional size.

overview.base:
You convincingly physically @L[Condition:Disguised]{disguise} yourself to look like any similar species within 1 @L[Core:Size]{size} of your own @L[Core:Size]{size}.
Note: Any creature can attempt to @L[Ability:Check Disguise]{Check Disguise} to discover this.

You move on a distance up to your @L[Core:Movement Speed]{movement speed} on the ground. If you have a @L[Core:Movement Speed]{fly speed} or @L[Core:Movement Speed]{swim speed} then you may move in the air or in water accordingly. This movement doesn't trigger @L[Category:Reactive abilities]{reactive abilities}.

You become @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak} ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, @L[Core:Cover]{three-quarters cover}, or some other feature which the @L[Core:GM]{GM} determines is appropriate for being @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.

results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You crawl at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and can @L[Ability:Move]{Move} at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} speed while @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. Additionally, @L[Category:Movement effects]{movement effects} only require a DC 10 @L[Core:SNK]{SNK} @L[Core:Feat Interaction]{feat save} to keep from breaking your @L[Condition:Hidden]{hiding}.
overview.proficient: You crawl at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed} and can @L[Ability:Move]{Move} at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed} while @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.

overview.base: You have @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming} and @L[Ability:Diving]{Diving} but have @L[Core:Movement Speed]{no walk speed}.
You no longer have to stay on the surface of water while @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming}.
